name: Axl & Tuna
description:
PocketGamer's BIG Indie Pitch Winner!

"This has got to be the best "feel good" game of the year, so far!"

"The Feel-Good Game That You'll Keep Running Back To." - TouchArcade

"Finally, a colourful endless runner that's got enough charm to rise above the herds of mobile games in that genre." - The Guardian

"Axl & Tuna is a youthful, energetic, and well executed addition to the endless runner genre that many fans will welcome." - 148 Apps

"Whimsical fun" - GeekDad

A high-speed chase through beautiful roller-coaster tracks that will challenge adults and entertain kids. No hidden InApp purchase fees!

Axl & Tuna is a humorous take on the endless runner, featuring beautiful animations, family-friendly humor, and hours of entertainment.

Go beyond the tap-tap! Discover unparalleled jumps, catching air, fast free falls and forward/backward flips all at your fingertips!

Help Axl chase lost Fuzzbot in the Fuzzbot Factory. Beat your daily best scores for the number of Fuzzbots collected, distance covered, and tricks performed.

New day? You play on a completely new track!

Encounter a wide array of cute robots along the way and add them to your collection.

And finally, don’t forget to talk to us! Have some thoughts? Let us know. We’re listening and love hearing from you!
